column4: Is there a program that I can use to capture input from a usb digital signature pad?
try looking up the make and model of your pad in the forum

So I haven't found anything in the forum on my signature pad (it is detected in lspci) and all I find in google is that there are developer tools to help people make a program to use it but I can't find anything completed.
Thanks, I'll keep hunting then.  I can't imagine linux has a driver for it and it detects but nothing can receive input.
